dialogues.speaker: Knight
dialogues.text: Halt, stranger! Who dares enter the domain of the Eternal King?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown Adventurer
dialogues.text: I am but a humble traveler, seeking wisdom and fortune.

dialogues.speaker: Knight
dialogues.text: Many have faltered in that quest. What makes you think you shall succeed?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown Adventurer
dialogues.text: I carry with me the hopes and dreams of my village. Failure is not an option.

dialogues.speaker: Knight
dialogues.text: Your resolve is admirable. May your journey be filled with fortune.
